About Me

My name is Bogdan Rozhevsky. I am 18 years old and at this stage of my life I am studying on the 4th course at Sumy Professional College, National University of Food Technologies, specialty of computer engineering.

I'm a beginner in web applications and website development. I am engaged in design and frontend development of small projects of different orientation.

I've got some experience working with databases, web-server administration, raster and vector graphics processing in popular editors. Also have a basic knowledge of PHP.

In the future I would like to devote myself to the development of neural networks.

Portfolio

Uber

It’s simple landing page for taxi service. Consists of 6 sections and has 3 adaptive versions.

Pulse

It’s the sports watch store page. Consists of 7 sections and has 3 adaptive versions.

Cryptolayer

It’s a multi-page corporate website of a company that trades in cryptocurrency and forex markets. Consists of the main page (9 sections) and 2 additional pages. There’s also registration/login form and a user account (6 pages).

Hashlang

It’s a multi-page corporate website of a company that trades in cryptocurrency and forex markets. Consists of the main page (10 sections) and 4 additional pages. There’s also registration/login form and a user account (5 pages).

Sushi Parlour

It’s simple landing page for sushi bar. Consists of 8 sections and has 3 adaptive versions.

MartaUP

It’s simple landing page for a company that develops websites and mobile applications. Consists of 4 sections and has 3 adaptive versions.
